subject: Rado Watches
body:
Greetings!

Our intention is to offer to only those interested. If not the mechanizim is in place for you to decide.

http://mwvkpimd.melikka.com/change/


A soft smile appeared in her eyes. She wanted to say something but I stopped her. And then I kept on combing her hair with my fingers until she went to sleep.
